metadata.title: CVE-2018-19296 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
PHPMailer before 5.2.27 and 6.x before 6.0.6 is vulnerable to an object injection attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-19296` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libphp-phpmailer - 5.2.14+dfsg-2.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libphp-phpmailer package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.2.14+dfsg-2.4').
